title: Up close with Alchemy’s stunning new in-house Cerakote finish & paint options
content:
Yesterday, Alchemy bikes announced a two new bikes, and updated Arktos, and a slew of new finish options. But it wasn’t until seeing them in person and getting one of the bikes in the sunlight, that the full picture emerged. In-House Cerakote When it comes to finishes, Alchemy says they can pretty much do whatever

The post Up close with Alchemy’s stunning new in-house Cerakote finish & paint options appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
